net.cnri.repository.util

Class RepositoryJsonSerializerV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.util.RepositoryJsonSerializerV2
  • Deprecated. 
    Use RepositoryJsonSerializer.

    @Deprecated
public class RepositoryJsonSerializerV2
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for serializing an arbitrary DigitalDbject to a JSON string and back again. You can either serialize a DigitalObject a list of DigitalObjects or an entire repository. Also provides a method for directly loading a repository from a url that returns a JSON string.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RepositoryJsonSerializerV2.DOView
      Deprecated. 
      The DOView object loads all attributes and elements of a digital object into into a java object.

      • toJSON

        public static java.lang.String toJSON(Repository repository,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude)
        Deprecated. 
        Given a Repository this method will return a JSON String that represents all the object in the Repository. Only elements explicitly included in the in elementsToInclude List will be included in the JSON
        Parameters:
        repository -
        elementsToInclude - A list of Strings that are the names of the elements to be included in the JSON
